name: GDIntercept
description: A GD proxy mod which allows you to intercept and modify any communication sent through the Cocos2D-X HttpClient.

issues.info: Inform issues through the repository issues page.

pause-requests.name: Pause Requests
pause-requests.description: Pauses all requests and set their timeout to infinite.

censor-data.name: Censor Sensitive Data
censor-data.description: Censors all known sensitive keys in GD and some common sensitive keys

remember-requests.name: Remember Requests
remember-requests.description: Remembers all requests made in the current session.

raw-data.name: Raw Data
raw-data.description: Displays data in its raw state without any manipulation of the text. (WARNING! This can make the game freeze on particularly large requests/responses)

theme.name: Theme
theme.description: The theme of the code block.
